name: KEM--2019 The 9th International Conference on Advanced Materials Research (ICAMR 2019)--EI Compendex, Scopus
content: Accepted ICAMR 2019 registered and presented full papers will be published by Key Engineering Materials (ISSN: 1662-9795), indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, SCImago Journal & Country Rank (SJR), etc. →Previous ICAMR: All ICAMR proceedings have been successfully published, and almost all have been indexed by EI Compendex; ICAMR 2018 –KEM proceedings already get online and indexed by EI Compendex;and Scopus ICAMR 2017 –KEM proceedings already get online and indexed by EI Compendex, and Scopus, etc. →Keynote Speaker: Prof. Serge Zhuiykov, Ghent University Global Campus, South Korea; Prof. Alan Lau, Swinburne University of Technology, Australia; Prof. Mattheus F. A. Goosen, Alfaisal University, Saudi Arabia; →Contact: Ms. Celine. Xi/ icamr@sciei.org/ Phone : +1-562-606-1057 (English)/+861-820-7777775 (English&Chinese)
organizers: Shaw Foundation Alumni House, National University of Singapore
